title: Protocol Village: Ankr to Create Liquid Staking Tokens for Bitcoin Staked via Babylon
description: The latest in blockchain tech upgrades, funding announcements and deals. For the period of Feb. 29-March 6.

title: Crypto industry momentum ‘is picking up, and it's unstoppable’ — Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin
description:
Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin told ETHDenver attendees that crypto is part of the next super cycle and “we are ready for a new system of the world.”

Crypto appears to be in a bull market, perhaps not by a technical definition, but most of the attendees at ETHDenver would agree that it sure feels like it. 

Even Ethereum co-founder and Consensys CEO Joe Lubin believes that things are looking up for crypto, and he’s convinced that the best is yet to come.

On Feb. 29, Lubin joined the “What will drive the next super cycle” fireside chat moderated by Axios reporter Crystal Kim, and during the conversation, Lubin touched on the current “super cycle,” whether or not a spot BTC and ETH ETF are good for retail investors and the more developer-focused community and the growing need for decentralization in multiple industries.

Read more

title: Next-Gen Crypto Boom: Coins Set for a 1,000% Upswing
description: Get ready for the next big crypto revolution! Ethereum (ETH) leads the charge with a potential 1,000% upswing, setting the stage for an explosive altcoin season. Discover how other promising coins are gearing up to potentially outperform even ETH's success, mirroring a massive growth trend in the ever-evolving crypto market.

title: Ethereum (ETH) and Ripple (XRP) Holders Flock to Raffle Coin (RAFF) Presale Unveiling 50X Potential
description: Ethereum (ETH) has broken past $3,400 as of this writing, riding the wave of Bitcoin (BTC) surpassing $62,000 within the day’s trading session. However, one altcoin in the top 10 hsa continued to underwhelm even as most altcoins turned in double-digit gains in the past week. Care to take a guess? It’s perennial underperformer Ripple (XRP).

title: Value Locked in Defi Nears $100 Billion Milestone Amidst Broad Market Uptick and Lido Dominance
description: Five days ago, the total value locked (TVL) in decentralized finance (defi) protocols exceeded the $80 billion mark, and since that point, it has expanded by an additional $11.66 billion. title: Indonesia set to review its cryptocurrency taxation policies
description: Indonesia is currently undergoing a comprehensive evaluation of its cryptocurrency taxation policies, spurred by the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency’s (Bappebti) request for the Ministry of Finance to reexamine existing tax structures applied to crypto transactions. Indonesia’s Bappebti wants crypto tax policies reassessed This call for reassessment underscores the acknowledgment of cryptocurrencies’ burgeoning importance within […]

title: Crypto Council comments on Hong Kong’s stablecoin regulation
description: The Crypto Council for Innovation (CCI) recently submitted a comprehensive commentary on Hong Kong’s proposed regulatory framework for stablecoins. The proposed regime, outlined by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) and Financial Services and the Treasury Bureau (FSTB), aimed to introduce licensing requirements for stablecoin issuers operating within the jurisdiction. title: $90,000,000,000,000 Transfer of Wealth Begins, Creating Richest Generation in Human History: Report
description:
